name: git-worktree-navigator
title: Git Worktree Navigator
description: A Raycast plugin to manage Git worktrees, switch features, and streamline development.
author: john_doe_22

commands.name: index
commands.title: Add Project
commands.description: Add Git repositories to your project list for quick access and streamlined worktree management. Specify the root directory of your Git project to include it in the extension. Once added, you can easily select the project and manage its worktrees.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
